short_summary: Furnish and deliver firewood annually to various campgrounds
description: See tender description field for full information on the contract opportunity. The contract will be effective from date of award until December 31, 2024, with four option years.
full_summary:
# Tender Notice: 5P421-222089 - FIREWOOD-BANFF NATIONAL PARK, ALBERTA
### Solicitation Title
5P421-222089: Firewood Supply and Delivery to Banff National Park, Alberta

### Solicitation Reference
Reference Number: WS3934866956
Solicitation Number: WS3934866956-Doc3981943542
Tender Closing Date: 2023-05-23T14:00:00

### Tender Overview
Parks Canada invites suppliers to bid on the delivery of 1200 cords of firewood annually to various campgrounds within Banff National Park, Alberta.

The tender objective is to provide a reliable supply chain for firewood to support campgrounds operations from January 1 to December 31.

### Solicitation Amendment
The closing time for the tender submission has been amended. Please disregard the initial closing time and submit all required supporting documentation and bid submission by 2023-05-23 at 14:00 EDT.

### Period of Contract
The contract will commence from the date of award and is effective until December 31, 2024, with four (4) option years.

### Deliverables
Suppliers are expected to deliver firewood to various campgrounds within Banff National Park, Alberta, as directed by the campground manager.

### Notice URL
The tender notice and attachments can be found at: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16098412?extsite=MTYwOTg0MTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16098412?extsite=MTYwOTg0MTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Contracting Entity
The contracting entity for this tender is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

### Contact Info
For further information, please contact Lorraine Jenkinson, PSPC/SPAC, at lorraine.jenkinson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
